title: Senior Accountant
description: We need a senior accountant to manage full-cycle accounting, monthly closing, financial reporting, tax declarations and coordination with external auditors.
required_skills: General ledger, accounts payable/receivable, monthly closing, financial statements, Swiss GAAP, SAP or Abacus
required_education: Bachelor in Accounting, Finance or Business Administration

title: Head of Marketing
description: We are looking for an experienced Head of Marketing to lead brand strategy, digital campaigns, content creation and a team of 5 marketing professionals.
required_skills: Brand management, digital marketing, SEO/SEM, social media, team leadership, budgeting

title: IT Project Manager
description: We need an IT project manager to lead software implementation projects, coordinate with vendors and stakeholders, and ensure on-time delivery.
required_skills: Project management, agile/scrum, stakeholder management, software delivery, JIRA, risk management

title: HR Business Partner
description: Searching for an experienced HR Business Partner to support business units with recruiting, performance management, HR development and change management.
required_skills: Recruiting, talent management, performance reviews, HR development, employment law, change management

title: CEO / Managing Director
description: We are looking for a seasoned CEO or Managing Director with a track record of leading mid-size companies (50-500 employees). P&L responsibility, board reporting, strategic planning.
required_skills: P&L ownership, strategic planning, board management, M&A, fundraising, organizational leadership
